Texts.Eng: Remember: Almost everything natural can extract, and more besides. Experiment, and you'll find some truly interesting things.
Texts.Chs: 记住：几乎所有的自然物质都可以进行萃取。还请多多实践，这样你才会发现更多有趣的事物。

Texts.Eng: ^orange;Seeds^reset; are best extracted for useful ^orange;tissue culture^reset;. Without them you will be unable to complete a ^orange;DNA Sample^reset; which is rather important to your success.
Texts.Chs: 各类^orange;植物果实^reset;是萃取^orange;组织培养物^reset;最简单的途径。而想要制作在实验中起着重要作用的^orange;DNA样本^reset;的话，组织培养物可是必不可少的哦。
